title: Automatically detecting Date/Time format in the DIH
description:
When ingesting several RSS/ATOM feeds, it's very laborious to format the data and time for each feed. I came across a bit of Java code that may or may not help alleviate some of this work.

http://www.java2s.com/Open-Source/Java-Document/RSS-RDF/Rome/com/sun/syndication/io/impl/DateParser.java.htm

I think that this would be a great addition to those of us who ingest a lot of syndicated data and then want to query on it.

Thanks, 
Adam
